title: ASUS rolls out an Android 12 beta update to the ROG Phone 3
content:
ASUS is updating its nearly two-year old gaming phone to Android 12. The ASUS ROG Phone 3, which launched in July 2020, is now receiving an Android 12 beta. As the device owners would recall, this wasnâ€™t totally unexpected at all. The Taiwanese OEM promised to deliver the update to the phone in the second

The post ASUS rolls out an Android 12 beta update to the ROG Phone 3 appeared first on XDA.
description: ASUS has begun rolling out the first Android 12 beta build for the ROG Phone 3. Read on to know more about this update!
